deviceInfo.description: Information about the device used for the in-app open event.

appPackageName.description: The package name of the app.

email.description: The email address of the user.

expiresAt.description: The timestamp when the message expires.

deviceInfo.appPackageName.description: The package name of the app.

templateId.description: The unique identifier of the template used in the in-app open event.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of the message.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the in-app open event occurred.

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign associated with the in-app open event.

userId.description: The unique identifier of the user.
